org.jerkar.api.depmanagement

Class JkResolveResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jerkar.api.depmanagement.JkResolveResult
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class JkResolveResult
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Result of a module dependency resolution for a given scope.
    When resolving a module dependencies for a given scope, we expect to get
    • The list of publishLocalOnly file constituting the resolved dependencies (the jar files for instance)
    • The JkVersionProvider that specify which static version has been taken in account when a module dependency is declared using dynamic versions (as 1.0.+)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
